articles.title: Greetings to King of Lesotho
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Lesotho
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Letsie III, king of Lesotho, on the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the king bigger success in his work for the country's stability and development, expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long history and tradition would steadily grow strong.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of WPK Central Committee Meets Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of WPK Central Committee Meets Palestinian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday met and had a talk with Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The floral basket was handed to Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, Tuesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tajik President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tajik President
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Emomali Rahmon, president of Tajikistan, on September 2.
					 The president in the message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the founding anniversary of the DPRK, the national day.
					
					 He expressed belief that the traditional and friendly ties between the two countries will continue to develop in the future, too.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and success and the friendly people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party Here
articles.content:
Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party Here
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party, arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association led by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Participants in Pyongyang International Conference on Promoting Sustainable Development
articles.content:
Participants in Pyongyang International Conference on Promoting Sustainable Development
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Prof. Kyung-Ae Park at University of British Columbia in Canada who doubles as director of the Canada-DPRK knowledge partnership program and experts from Malaysia, U.S., China, India and UK arrived here Tuesday to participate in the Pyongyang International Conference on Promoting Sustainable Development.

articles.title: Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and its members led by Co-Chairman Johnny Hon, arrived here Tuesday to participate in the second meeting of the council.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests including a delegation of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and its members and a delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Cycling March of Koreans in China for Reunification Starts
articles.content:
Cycling March of Koreans in China for Reunification Starts
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A cycling  march for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula started on Tuesday on the ninth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 A kick-off ceremony was held before the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang and a group of cyclists for reunification of the above-said Chinese regional preparatory committee.
					
					 The speakers said whoever has blood and soul of the Korean nation should uphold the great programme for reunification common to the nation provided by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, stressing that no matter how desperately the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad may work, they can't block the march of the compatriots for national reunification.
					
					 After leaving Pyongyang amid the warm send-off of the masses, the group of cyclists arrived at Panmunjom that day via various areas. 
					
					 They had a meeting for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula before Phanmun Pavilion.
					
					 Prior to this, the participants laid bunches of flowers and paid tribute to the monument to the autograph of President Kim Il Sung standing at Panmunjom.
					
					 The speakers said that the Korean nation is undergoing bitter pain and misfortune resulting from the division caused by outside forces, noting that this march launched in Pyongyang came to a halt due to the cursed barrier dividing this land.
					
					 They expressed the will to intensify the struggle for peace and independent reunification of the country till the day when fireworks celebrating reunification are displayed over the land after foreign forces are driven out of Korea.
					
					 Witnesses and victims of the group allurement and abduction perpetrated by the south Korean puppet group of traitors condemned them for trumpeting about "volunteer defection".
					
					 They termed it another base move to hide the truth behind the crime and escape public criticism of it and domestic and foreign pressure upon the criminals.
					
					 They demanded the Park Geun Hye group kneel down and apologize to all Koreans and the conscience of the world and send the abductees back to their homeland at once.
					
					 An appeal to all Koreans was published at the meeting.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes 2016 Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes 2016 Opens
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of IT successes 2016 on the theme of "Self-development-first principle, enthusiasm for collectivist emulation and international competitiveness" opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Tuesday.
					 It will offer opportunities for examining sci-tech successes made in the course of putting industrial establishments on IT basis and their economic efficiencies and selecting model IT-based units, the best ten IT enterprises and the best ten IT products.
					
					 On display there are at least 1,000 IT successes and products presented by more than 260 commissions, ministries, national institutions, education and research institutes, industrial establishments and IT units. 
					
					 The exhibition is divided into four panels such as IT business, information security. It will involve new products presentation, experience sharing, security software contest and exchange and service of the latest technical products.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Ro Tu Chol and officials concerned and officials and working people of the units participating in the exhibition.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in an opening address that the exhibition would offer a good occasion in developing technologies with world competitiveness in the field of IT and raising the nation's overall IT level, calling on the participants to widely apply the successes and experience gained by the advanced units.

articles.title: Apple Show Held
articles.content:
Apple Show Held
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a show of apples at the Unjong Teahouse in Central District, Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 The participants estimated at least 20 varieties of apples displayed by fruit farms across the country by examining their sweetness, sourness, fragrance and juice.

articles.title: Officials of Power Organs Stand in Van of Recovery Efforts
articles.content:
Officials of Power Organs Stand in Van of Recovery Efforts
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Officials of power organs in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK have taken the lead in the recovery efforts.
					 In Hoeryong City of the province, the officials of the City People's Committee, together with inhabitants, restored the completely destroyed Hoeryong-Puryong road only in one day. And they took emergency measures to supply drinking water to the servicepersons and inhabitants out in the flood damage rehabilitation drive.
					
					 Officials of the Musan County People's Committee stood in the van of the struggle to reopen four roads blocked by landslide. With builders, they are now carrying out a project to expand the damaged road section of 50 kilometers at the final stage.
					
					 The officials of the Kyonghung County People's Committee played a key role in restoring destroyed 70 km-long railways and Hoeryong-Kyonghung road and damaged sections of nine embankments in the county.
					
					 Such devoted struggle of government officials can be seen in Onsong and Yonsa counties and all other flood-hit areas.

articles.title: Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The construction of houses is progressing apace in Heoryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK. 
					 The soldier-builders in charge of the housing construction in the city carried out the ground-making for houses for 1,800 families at over 90 percent while producing more than one million blocks.
					
					 Thanks to their devoted efforts, 50-odd apartment houses for nearly 1,000 families took their shapes in Obong area alone. 
					
					 Such progress in housing construction is also made in other areas of the city. 
					
					 The solider-builders are doing as much as possible to raise the speed of rehabilitation and construction in the disaster areas.

articles.title: Books on Folk Remedies Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Books on Folk Remedies Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Tens of kinds of books on traditional medicine have been recently brought out by the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital in the DPRK.
					 Those popular books include "Guide to Food Used as Koryo Traditional Medicine" and "6,000 Remedies" which deals with folk remedies in a comprehensive way.
					
					 There is also "Traditional-Modern Clinical Medicine on Sterility Treatment" which gives an exposition of sci-tech problems arising in diagnosing and treating sterility on Koryo (traditional) and modern medical basis.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on Human Rights Violations in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on Human Rights Violations in U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- American politicians frequently call their country "society equal for all", but the United States is an "empire of evils" where human rights are ruthlessly violated and strangled.
					 The U.S. emerged an empire in America after exterminating the Indians and got ill-famed for slave trade, Hong Chun Gil, a researcher of the National House of Class Education in the DPRK, said, adding:
					
					 In the U.S., killings, robbery and all other sorts of crimes are committed one after another under the "Statue of Liberty" and there are many jobless and homeless people wandering up and down.
					
					 Ceaseless state terrorism, torture, racism, violence and other illegal atrocities are threatening citizens' rights and lives.
					
					 The number of ultra-right criminal organizations in the U.S. mainland reached to more than 890 last year, according to an annual report made by a civic organization of the U.S.
					
					 In particular, the Ku Klux Klan, which has earned an ill-fame for advocating extreme racism, grew twice in number of its branches in one year--from 72 to 190 branches.
					
					 Meanwhile, murder cases are reported without letup even a day, including killings of blacks by the white police.
					
					 In July 2014, the Italian Ministry of Justice sentenced two GIs to six years in prison each on charge of raping a Romanian woman who was six months pregnant at a local city of Italy.
					
					 The facts go to prove that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Avenue toward Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Avenue toward Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday runs an editorial to mark the ninth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration. It calls upon all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to pave a wide avenue toward independent reunification despite the persistent challenges of the anti-reunification forces.
					 The north-south summit took place and a declaration for improvement of the north-south relations and peace and prosperity was adopted in Pyongyang on October 4, Juche 96 (2007).
					
					 The declaration gives clear answers to the basic and realistic problems arising in the movement for national reunification including the issue of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving durable peace of the Korean peninsula and the issue of realizing multi-faceted cooperation and exchange between the north and the south including economic cooperation in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The publication of the October 4 declaration marked a historic event of the nation as it powerfully demonstrated the steadfast will of the Korean nation for reunification at home and abroad and brought about a turning phase in national reunification, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The cause of national reunification is now facing a grave obstacle and trial due to the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities' anti-DPRK confrontation moves.
					
					 The reality requires all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to turn out as one and resolutely smash the U.S. and south Korean group of traitors' frantic confrontation ruckus against the DPRK and bring about a turning phase of independent reunification by preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Obstacles and ordeals still lie in the way of national reunification, but nobody can block the Korean nation advancing towards reunification by following the great sun of the nation.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is sure to triumph thanks to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration clearly indicating the way for independent reunification and the inexhaustible strength of the Koreans firmly united in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People". 
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) comprehensively deals with the experience gained by the WPK in leading the Korean people along the road of shining victory under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and indicates theoretical and practical issues arising in strengthening the party in every way and increasing its leadership role as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the party into the Juche-oriented revolutionary party which attained the highest level in unity, organizing ability and militancy and the spirit of devoted service to the people with his original idea and theory of party building and outstanding leadership. This is the greatest feats he performed before the party and the revolution, the article says, adding;
					
					 The WPK's dignity and might are being fully demonstrated thanks to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is his steadfast will to develop the party into the genuine one of the leader and Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party always shining with the ideology and august names of the great leaders. 
					
					 As Kim Jong Un, symbol of invincibility and mightiness of the WPK, is standing at the helm of the Korean revolution, the prestige of the WPK as an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people is undisputed and the Juche revolution is sure to win a final victory.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Puppet Regime for Soliciting Cooperation in Pressurizing DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Puppet Regime for Soliciting Cooperation in Pressurizing DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, during his recent junket to the U.S. to take part in the UN General Assembly, held "bilateral talks" with his counterparts of some countries, at which he begged "the international community to ratchet up the pressure on the north in order to seek solution to its nuclear issue", asserting that "the intensity and cycle of the north's nuclear test have changed" and imploring for "proactive cooperation in escalating independent sanctions against the north."
					 In the meantime, Kim Hong Gyun, puppet chief delegate to the six-party talks, begged the neighboring countries for "support" and "cooperation" in a new UN "sanctions resolution," while discussing "the cooperation proposal for settling the nuclear issue of the north" and "the intensity of sanctions".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says that this solicitation diplomacy is nothing but a disgusting behavior of the halfwit who knows nothing about how things are going in the world.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said poor diplomacy of the puppet regime reveals its cynical ploy to bring down the strategic position of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state at any cost as it was pursuant to the U.S. anachronistic policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The strategic position of the DPRK is rising as the days go by as it ranked itself among nuclear giants after having access to nukes to cope with the increasing nuclear threat of the U.S. and possessing even H-bombs and is now in the process of steadily bolstering up its nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity.
					
					 Poor-looking puppet group's hectic diplomacy for soliciting pressure would only precipitate their miserable doom.
					
					 No matter how wild the puppet regime may run, the strategic position of the DPRK will remain unchanged.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop going reckless, well aware of their miserable fate already sealed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Its Moves for Reinvasion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Its Moves for Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Protests were staged before the Diet building in Tokyo and in Osaka, Hiroshima, Nagoya and other cities of Japan on the lapse of one year since the "security legislation" was adopted in Japan.
					 The protesters strongly demanded the immediate repeal of the "security legislation" which allows Japan to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and legalizes the dispatch of the "Self-Defence Forces" overseas.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes:
					
					 The Japanese authorities, persistently paying no heed to this demand, claim that it is aimed to protect the state and preserve "global peace" and have access to war deterrence by tightening the Japan-U.S. alliance.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seek to kick off overseas reinvasion openly under the pretext of military assistance to allies, pursuant to the "legislation".
					
					 Some countries are becoming increasingly cautious about the "legislation."
					
					 It is the views of Japanese experts that their country may be considered as an enemy state to become the target of various countries' accusations and eventually may go to ruin in the face of preemptive strikes. We would like to remind the Japanese authorities of their worries once again.
					
					 If Japan rushes headlong into overseas reinvasion in disregard of this advice, it will finally meet doom. The land of Japan remained as it was in the past but now it will be reduced to ashes and vanish from the surface of the earth once and for all.
					
					 Japan's reinvasion will finally lead it to ruin.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns S. Korean Authorities for Going against Trend of History
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns S. Korean Authorities for Going against Trend of History
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities busied themselves with "diplomacy for putting pressure on the north" at the UN and other international arenas.
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye during her recent junkets to foreign countries including Netherlands allegedly agreed to boost the international cooperation in pressurizing the DPRK, blustering that the "north's nukes would will bring an unavoidable disaster." 
					
					 The south Korean puppet minister of Foreign Affairs blustered at the talks with his U.S. and Japanese counterparts in New York that "if they fail to strongly react to the nuclear capability of the north which has reached a high level, it would bring worldwide disaster".
					
					 Earlier, the south Korean puppet minister of Defense in phone messages with his counterparts of the U.S. and Japan begged them to "ratchet up sanctions in response to the provocation".
					
					 The hectic diplomacy conducted by the Park Geun Hye group to turn the 71st UN General Assembly into a platform for stirring up the atmosphere of escalating the international sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK is nothing but ridiculous hysteria of halfwits unaware of how the trend of history has changed.
					
					 The geopolitical situation of the world has changed thanks to the strategic position and might of the DPRK defending the sovereignty of the nation and its right to live and stability in the Asia-Pacific region with the treasured nuclear sword of justice.
					
					 No sanctions on the part of the U.S. and its vassal forces can ever work on the DPRK dynamically advancing, holding aloft the banner of Songun and the banner of the self-development-first principle.
					
					 The "story about the uselessness of sanctions" against the DPRK is heard among the U.S. and its vassal forces which have staged the harshest sanctions and pressure racket against the DPRK for the past several decades since they put it "on the list of diverse sanctions."
					
					 The south Korean puppet group are behaving in a disgusting manner, talking about "strategic partnership" and "international cooperation" but nobody regards them as a counterpart for "diplomatic cooperation." Foreign countries just treat the puppet forces as U.S. colonial stooges and rabid dogs running amuck to do harm to their fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 No matter what hectic diplomacy south Korean authorities, the sycophants bereft of even an iota of national self-esteem, may conduct in different countries in a bid to hurt the compatriots, the DPRK's strategic position can never change.
					
					 Their diplomacy of clinging tighter to the coattails of foreign forces would only bring bitterer shame and invite international isolation and precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Service Members of S. Korean Puppet Army Use Contaminated Water
articles.content:
Service Members of S. Korean Puppet Army Use Contaminated Water
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the contamination of drinking water in units of the south Korean puppet army reached a very serious level, according to a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The results of a lawmaker's analysis of data obtained from the puppet Ministry of Defense on September 28 confirmed that water which has come out from a total of 776 reservoirs over the last five years was seriously contaminated.
					
					 It is said just about half of the service members of the puppet army use water supplied by water system while the rest of them drink contaminated underground water.
					
					 Consequently, various diseases are rife in the puppet army.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper on Injustice of Dissolution of Ad Hoc Committee for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper on Injustice of Dissolution of Ad Hoc Committee for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial on Oct. 1 disclosed the injustice of the dissolution of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster.
					 The editorial denounced the "government" for putting an end to the activities of the ad hoc committee on Sept. 30 on the basis of the unilateral interpretation of the special law on the ferry Sewol.
					
					 It held that the regime's action to forcibly disband the committee is little short of killing the victims twice.

articles.title: More Deaths Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
More Deaths Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker of an opposition party of south Korea disclosed that hundreds of service members of the puppet army died due to various cases and accidents until the first half of this year since 2012.
					 Suicides hold the largest proportion.

articles.title: Immediate Cancellation of Plan for THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Immediate Cancellation of Plan for THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on September 28 demanded the immediate cancellation of the plan for THAAD deployment.
					 The editorial said that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities chose the Songju golf links situated in Chojon-myon of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province as a site for deploying THAAD.
					
					 It said that THAAD deployment would only strengthen the alliance between the U.S. and south Korea for war, bring profits to arms dealers, push the Korean peninsula to the brink of war and create a crisis in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The editorial demanded the immediate cancellation of the harmful and dangerous plan for THAAD deployment as it poses threats to the lives, security and properties of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Website
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted on the Polish website DPRK on Sept. 28.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road to develop the party into his party for all ages.

articles.title: No Place for THAAD in S. Korea: Brazilian Politician
articles.content:
No Place for THAAD in S. Korea: Brazilian Politician
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, posted an article titled "U.S. and south Korean political parties reject THAAD deployment" on the newspaper Hora do Povo on Sept. 28.
					 The article said that the green parties of the U.S. and south Korea in a joint statement on Sept. 19 clarified the stand against THAAD deployment in south Korea, adding:
					
					 Deploying THAAD in south Korea will inflame tensions in Northeast Asia and harm global peace by inviting arms race.
					
					 The gas and powerful electromagnetic wave that emit during the operation of THAAD most badly affect the health of citizens and agricultural production.
					
					 So popular masses including people in Songju County, south Korea staged large-scale protest rallies and demos in demand of the immediate withdrawal of the decision on deploying THAAD threatening their right to live.
					
					 Just as the green parties of the U.S. and south Korea declared that they would cooperate in action for the said quick withdrawal, THAAD shouldn't be deployed anywhere in south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Marked in Ethiopia
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Marked in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by ten branch groups under the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia on Sept. 28 and 29 to mark the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Speakers said that HE Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK 19 years ago served as a historic event of great significance in strengthening it and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 They stressed that the WPK has faithfully served the people, being responsible for their destiny over seven decades since its founding.

articles.title: Great Leaders of DPRK Praised by Myanmar Personage
articles.content:
Great Leaders of DPRK Praised by Myanmar Personage
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, released a statement on September 29 to observe the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the eternal leader of the Korean people who founded the Juche idea, the guiding idea of humankind, and founded the WPK guided by the idea.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the WPK who developed it into an invincible revolutionary party, true to the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 The respected HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, has added luster to the revolutionary idea and leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 I am sure that the WPK shining along with the immortal august names of the President and HE Kim Jong Il would lead the Korean people to victory and glory under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I extend firm support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their just struggle for building a socialist power and accomplishing the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean People Demand Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean People Demand Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a rally at Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on October 1, on the lapse of 900 days since the ferry Sewol disaster occurred, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Attending the rally were 5,000 people from all walks of life including members of the Consultative Council of Families of Victims for Probing Truth about April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster, the April 16 Solidarity  and other bereaved families.
					
					 Speakers at the rally said that the present "government" persistently hindered the work of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster and finally forcefully disbanded it.
					
					 History always stands by the people who defend dignity of human being and it is the truth that the power swimming against history is bound to be brought down, they said, expressing the will to work hard to open the way of truth in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 50o aniversario de independencia de Lesotho
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 50o aniversario de independencia de Lesotho
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Lesotho, Letsie III, con motivo del 50o aniversario de la independencia de este reino. 
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, que tienen larga historia y tradicion, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran ininterrumpidamente, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en los trabajos del destinatario por la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador palestino
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador palestino
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 4 con Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, embajador palestino en Corea quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Tiene lugar caravana en bicicleta de coreanos residentes en China
articles.content:
Tiene lugar caravana en bicicleta de coreanos residentes en China
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, se realizo el dia 4 la caravana en bicicleta por la reunificacion del Comite Preparatorio Regional de China para la Conferencia Conjunta de Partidos Politicos, Entidades y Personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en Ultramar para la Paz y la Reunificacion Independiente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					La ceremonia de partida tuvo lugar en la explanada frente al Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores capitalinos y los miembros de la caravana.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que todas las personas con la sangre y espiritu de la nacion coreana deben apoyar el gran programa comun de la nacion por la reunificacion, preparado por los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu.
					
					Por muy brutales que fueran las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas, no podran impedir la lucha de los coreanos por la reintegracion territorial, recalcaron.
					
					La caravana partio de esta capital recibiendo cordiales saludos de despedida de la multitud y llego este dia a Phanmunjom luego de pasar por varias regiones.
					
					Los caravanistas realizaron frente al Pabellon Phanmun el acto de juramento por la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Antes del acto, rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar ramos de flores ante la lapida con su firma construida en Phanmunjom.
					
					En la ocasion, los oradores senalaron que la caravana iniciada en Pyongyang se detuvo ante la rencorosa muralla de hormigon que atraviesa el territorio patrio y prosiguieron que la nacion coreana sufre grandes desgracias y dolores a causa de la division impuesta por las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Expresaron la voluntad de desarrollar con dinamismo la lucha por la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la patria hasta el dia cuando se lancen las salvas de reunificacion en el territorio sin las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					El testigo y la victima del rapto colectivo contra las muchachas norcoreanas, cometido por la banda titere surcoreana, senalaron que tambien en estos momentos en que se pusieron a desnudo sus crimenes nefandos esos tipejos lanzan las palabrerias absurdas como la "fuga voluntariosa". Y las calificaron de otra artimana para eludir las criticas a su barbaridad y la presion de la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					Demandaron que la horda de Park Geun-hye pida disculpas de rodillas ante toda la nacion coreana y la conciencia del mundo y devuelva de inmediato a las muchachas norcoreanas a la RPDC.
					
					Fue publicado el llamamiento a todos los connacionales coreanos.

articles.title: Participantes en caravana en bicicleta exhortan a celebrar acto pannacional por reunificacion
articles.content:
Participantes en caravana en bicicleta exhortan a celebrar acto pannacional por reunificacion
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la caravana en bicicleta por la reunificacion del Comite Preparatorio Regional de China para la Conferencia Conjunta de Partidos Politicos, Entidades y Personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en Ultramar para la Paz y la Reunificacion Independiente de la Peninsula Coreana publicaron el dia 4 un llamamiento a todos los coreanos.
					Segun el documento, el Comite Preparatorio Regional de China para la Conferencia Conjunta realizo la marcha en bicicleta para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana con motivo del 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, pero la caravana no llego al Sur de Corea por no poder pasar Phanmunjom. 
					
					La nacion coreana homogenea con larga historia de cinco milenios se queda todavia como unica nacion dividida en el mundo y se considera como pronombre de confrontacion y la guerra, lo cual es una gran verguenza de la nacion, senala la nota e insiste en lograr el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion para abrir el ancho camino de la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					Llama a todos los coreanos a levantar en alto la bandera de la independencia nacional y de la gran unidad nacional. 
					
					Continua que todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse como un solo hombre para lograr la paz duradera en el territorio patrio de 1 200 kilometros tras expulsar a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano y rechazar la politica de enfrentamiento fratricida de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					El Comite Preparatorio Regional de China para la Conferencia Conjunta luchara con mas dinamismo hasta cuando se realice la caravana en bicicleta desde Pyongyang hasta Seul, asevera y apunta que nadie puede detener el avance de la nacion coreana levantada en la marcha general por la reunificacion de la patria.
